game.name: Find This Pixel Anomaly
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A cozy-horror game where you have to monitor surveillance camera footage to spot anomalies. Have you seen anything suspicious? File a report to fix it. But beware - too many anomalies will end the game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A cozy-horror game where you have to monitor surveillance camera footage to spot anomalies. Have you seen anything suspicious? File a report to fix it. But beware - too many anomalies will end the game.
